snippet: From fashion icons to political powerhouses, a fund-raiser hosted by Ronald O. Perelman gathered an eclectic philanthropic crowd.
abstract: Countless celebrities and politicians attend benefit for Apollo Theater at Wainscott estate of Ronald O Perelman in Hamptons, NY.
lead_paragraph: From fashion icons to political powerhouses, a fund-raiser hosted by Ronald O. Perelman gathered an eclectic philanthropic crowd.

headline.print_headline: A Variety Show for the Apollo
headline.main: A Variety Show for the Apollo in the Hamptons
